doc.title: List of color constants
doc.para:
List of color constants
ã€€These constants can be used in various color specification situations. These values may change the actual colors depending on the Windows settings.
clScrollBar : Scrollbar color clBackground : Desktop background color clActiveCaption : Active window title bar color clInactiveCaption : Inactive window title bar color clMenu : Menu background color clWindow : Window background color clWindowFrame : Window border color clMenuText : Menu text color clWindowText : Text color in window clCaptionText : Active window title bar text color clActiveBorder : Active window border color clInactiveBorder : Inactive window border color clAppWorkSpace : Application workspace color clHighlight : Background color of selected character clHighlightText : Selected character color clBtnFace : 3D object face color clBtnShadow : 3D object shadow color clGrayText : Dimmed text color clBtnText : 3D object text color clInactiveCaptionText : Inactive window title bar text color clBtnHighlight : Button highlight color cl3DDkShadow : 3D object dark shadow cl3DLight : Edge color of bright side of 3D object clInfoText : Tooltip text color clInfoBk : Tooltip background color
The above color samples (such as to the left of each color) may not be displayed properly depending on the browser.
